title: One Year's Worth of IPL Laser Hair Reduction for Women (£799) or Men (£999) for All Areas of the Body at GiGi London Medical Aesthetics (Save 94%)
highlights:
• Includes all areas, anywhere on the body
  • Reduces the appearance of body hair
  • One payment entitles you to 12 months of treatments
  • Treatment available for all areas of the body and also allows you to get treatment for any re-growth over the year period
  • Consistent treatments of two hours every month or six weeks
  • Situated in central London

title: Follicular Unit Hair Transplantation Treatment including 1000 Hairs for £1349 at The London Hair Transplant Clinic, Harley Street (£3400 Value)
highlights:
